website_summaries.verdict: Affordable and great value with bonus PPM meter and DVD for one-hour installation. High focus on odor and clarity of water with HydraCoil technology.
pros: Impressive faucet quality for the price
Components are excellent and design is compact to fit under smaller sinks
It also comes with an expansive 5-year warranty and lifetime guarantee
cons: Newer to the market, so still ironing out some kinks
Design could make it somewhat cumbersome to change filters

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy — leaks like crazy
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of experience with reverse osmosis filters. This is the third or fourth one I have installed This design reverses the usual male/female screws , and by far the WORST EXPERIENCE! The problem is the filter casing has male threads, so when it is screwed in, there is nothing to hold the O-ring in place. Consequently when pressurized, the O-ring will squirm out of its track and the unit will leak all over your kitchen floor. If you like to mop up leaks, this is the unit for you. Call their customer support and they offered me nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Chronic DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Very frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. I wanted to change out my Whirlpool RO system which was looking the worse for wear. I decided to give this a try even though it was about $50 cheaper. The Whirlpool is junk, this far surpasses it and has far better quality components. If your looking for a decent priced unit I highly recommend this one. Easy to install. The spigot is good quality chrome plated metal, no plastic or fake chrome.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin L. Benoit

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: It produces good water without a taste. Our water has iron and a sulfur taste if you drink it from the tap, nobody does unless they're drunk. I was skeptical because the price was so low but it has done really well. We have a well and I was afraid that the pressure too low or fluctuates too much for this to produce enough water to meet our needs. It produces enough drinking water for two people, not so sure about the claimed 100 gallons per day but t doesn't matter because we don't need more than 10 gallons a day.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: some small irritating  problems
customer_reviews.text: Works well with a couple of caveats. The filters weren't labeled as in the directions and I am not sure if I installed in the right order. One of the adaptors for hose insertion was loosely installed and I had some water around until I figured that it needed tightening. Hoses were a little too short....another foot on each would have been good. All important setup pictures in manual were too small. What could be the problem with enlarging them until they fill space provided?
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price and it works
customer_reviews.text: As you can see in the attached pictures we can see the results. I had to buy a bronze faucet separately to match my kitchen. I wish they had a smaller tank or maybe 2 smaller tank and different faucet options available. The taste is okay but I understand Kirikland adds minerals for taste. The price of replacement filters was the main reason I chose this one but it worked out great. The instructions could be alot better. There are pictures but as a long time QA and also a long time handyman I can see alot of ways to improve.
customer_reviews.author: Arash Behshadpoor

customer_reviews.title: No more Chlorine taste!
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I purchased the unit is because my tap water tastes like chlorine. I've tried to use the filtered pitchers of water, but they didn't remove the chlorine taste. So i went all in on this filter and really glad i did. It was mostly easy to install, but i did have to buy an additional hose from the hardware store (due to how my faucet was hookedup). Besides that, the install was rather easy (make sure you screw the filters on all the way before turning the water back on). Now i have what seems like an unlimited supply of clean and great tasting water! Ice cubes, coffee, water, it's all amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jaquillard

customer_reviews.title: 11 ppm, down from 222 ppm. Taste is great, very happy.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing, our tap water, while safe, does not taste good at all. It tested at 222 parts per million. This got it down to 11. That is better than most bottled water. It took a few hours to install, but quite a bit of that was moving around my faucet and soap dispenser (not required). If I guessed about how much time for just the water filter, it was probably 30 min. It will take up a big chunk of your under sink space, but well worth it. I'll always have one of these in my house forever now.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for.no problem installing,the performance just sucks.Tested my moms r.o system at 17 tds and she lives 300 feet from my house.this r.o unit tested 80tds so I'm returning and I'm gonna buy the kind she has (Nelson) also the water from my tap is 180 tds and my moms tap water is 301tds.
customer_reviews.author: kbear

customer_reviews.title: When it is bad it is really bad
customer_reviews.text: I have been working with Nu Aqua System for 2 months with making over 10 support calls and and still do not have a working RO system. it is now clear to me that it is not your RO system or your company, But I must be to stupid to install an simple RO system, even with a Master Degree in computer science. So I give up you win, I will post to the world that with all my education the Nu Aqua 5 stage RO filter system is to complex for me to install and operate.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Flanders

customer_reviews.title: FEEL SAFE TO DRINK OUR WATER
customer_reviews.text: We have a very good well system with several stages of purification, including modifying our pool to be a clean water reservoir. However, we did not trust drinking the water. Now that we have installed the NuAqua Platinum Reverse Osmosis System at the kitchen sink, we feel safe to drink the water, and no longer buy water. Our water now smells purified and tastes really good. We are filling dozens of water containers getting ready for the hurricane season. Only one problem is the promised PPM Meter was not in the package, but NuAqua Systems has promised to send us one when they receive this review.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Missing Clips.
customer_reviews.text: Would be great if it came with all the parts. Contacted to seller 89 days ago about sending clips. Still waiting for them. On the plus, it took my PPMs from 170 to 63. The charcaol will make the water cloudy at frist. Just let the tank fill and the drain it 3 times the water will be perfectly clear then.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love this system. Great value
customer_reviews.text: The faucet is stylish looking compare to most other RO systems. The assembly process was extremely easy. I had Whirlpool RO system before, it was more complicated to install. I loved the device that check the water particulates. It shows that after the filtration system, the water particulates are significantly less. Love this system.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Liaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The customer service there was super. Got all my requests taken care of by the customer service. So that I got myself and family using a great water supplying machine that uses the reverse osmosis process. My water tastes great and my family feels safe about drinking the water.
customer_reviews.author: R. H.

customer_reviews.title: Difficulty in reaching Customer Service and Follow-up
customer_reviews.text: I've been having an issue with the product and it hasn't even been installed for 3 weeks. Problems with one or multiple parts and their customer service is only available via email and barely open for communicating is adding insult to injury. Not certain I would've purchased from this company had I known this beforehand. One of the control valves (the automatic shut-off valve) is vibrating violently and making aggressive noises and seems to be an issue with the part when the faucet is used. Still waiting for a response from the NuAqua team.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: A good affordable system
customer_reviews.text: This system was much cheaper than my first RO system (culligan) and a little better i think (one more stage of filtration). Fairly easy installation if you have any plumbing experience. We've had it almost two months and So far we are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product w/critique
customer_reviews.text: There is two things they could improve on, the inline adapter needs a harder rubber washer and the end of the supplied manufacturer flexible lines are angled and have to be cut off square or they leak.
customer_reviews.author: Xeen

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this NUAqua system to replace my old Watts osmosis system. I like the design of this new NUAqua system because the transparent container of stage 1 filter and the ASO valve can be easily changed if it is not working. My old Watts system ASO valve is defect and I can't change it easily so I decide to purchase this new NUAqua system to replace it. It has been over one month now and everything is working as expected and I am very happy that I replaced my old system with this new one.
customer_reviews.author: llin5

customer_reviews.title: Simple install, tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy install with good directions. Read everything before you begin and you will have no trouble. Start water slow and check for leaks...I had a couple loose plastic hoses, easy to snug up. TDS went from 140 to 18. Tastes great. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ellis

customer_reviews.title: large capacity filters
customer_reviews.text: bought this one for my father in law delivered quickly. a good bit larger than the ones i have bought previously, a good thing, imho install went well except for one white hose that was a bit too short, but i just used some of the leftover hose from install. vast improvement in water quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than bottled!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a plumber just a retired housewife. Easy installation! Had a couple of leaks but that was only because I had not pushed the tubing all the way in. Two of the cartridges also leaked so I had my hubby tighten them. Love our water! Great product. Highly recommend it 😊! Test meter reading is 21.
customer_reviews.author: Mirita Dymczynski

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: We had previously been using a faucet water filter and believed we had high quality, filtered water with that, but did not like the bulky attachment on the faucet. So we researched RO systems online and found the NuAqua Systems was very highly recommended. It came with a water quality tester also. We tested with the faucet water filter (345) and regular tap water (380), and the results were almost identical!!!! We’ve been drinking and cooking with that water!! Then we tested our new NuAqua RO water - less than 60. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and big difference in PPM measurements
customer_reviews.text: Installation took an hour, directions were clear, tank filled up in an hour or so, the big one was the PPM from the supplied tool....before the reading was 476 PPM, after the reading is 028 - time to think about a whole house RO system.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Filter works great, hose connections may be fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Filter has worked great and provided pleasant tasting filtered water. Only complaint is that the quick connect connections for the hoses can be fragile and I had to replace one that started leaking with compression fitting from the hardware store. Getting everything to fit was a pain since the hoses were not meant to use another connector, but that is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, great tasting water!
customer_reviews.text: We have installed this on the day we received it and had been drinking the water since. We are enjoying the water. Tastes fresh! We should’ve done it sooner but I’m so glad that we have it. Saves on buying bottled water and we reduce plastic waste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good System
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to be good quality. It produces more RO water than my old system. HOWEVER it defiantly doesn’t produce 100 GPD. It came with all nessasary hardware and locking tape. No leaking issues. It appears to be the best deal for a “100 gpd “ system I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to everyone who is purchasing or lugging water. The quality of RO water is wonderful anyway but having it at your fingertips is the best. I think a reasonably handy person can install this and even a not so handy person can also if they take their time, follow the instructions and again take your time.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Brossa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This filter system has been a lifesaver. Installed in our fifth wheel so we no longer need to haul water! Definitely worth the money and as a matter of fact, we just purchased another one which we will install at our daughter’s home.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Cheek

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install,great water quality compared to water coming from the tap.I would recommend buying a few extra fittings, I broke 1 of the elbows and I had to buy some replacements. There is no leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Javeon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great water!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this in for three weeks now. The water tastes great. I use it for drinking, cooking, coffee, etc. And it sure makes pretty ice cubes! It’s easy to install, it just took a while to get all the hoses and filters attached. Thus far, I couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Big Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water Great TDS reduction
customer_reviews.text: Took my undesirable tap water that is very high in TDS and reduced it by 96%. Very satisfied. Easy installation with accompanying booklet and DVD instructions that are also available on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good system
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a challenge for an inexperienced person to install but even still, I did it! Excellent water quality, major transformation. The filter system does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Trash. Coupling looks like used ones. Installed as instructed but cant feed any water into tank
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and clear instructions for installation.
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased a reverse osmosis purifier from another company and the installation was a pain in the behind! With NU Aqua, installation was much easier with clear instructions and for the price, it out performed our previous one. The water taste better than the bottled water we had been purchasing. With 7 people in our household, we have never been short of purified water.
customer_reviews.author: Cuztomer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Avoid...... I’m a handyman and installed in a nice way but its leaking always and messed up my bottom cabinet
customer_reviews.author: Hura

customer_reviews.title: Great system easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I love this new ro system, I've never installed one of these before but luckily the dvd walked me through it step by step. With the Ppm meter they gave me I tested my water for the first time before and after. My ppm went from 275 to 8. I’m very pleased so far. Easy to install and I'm loving it ! Thank you so much for providing a great quality product with a simple set up for great tasting water :)
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Chico

customer_reviews.title: Great system that vastly improves taste
customer_reviews.text: Good clear instructions that were relatively straightforward to follow. I took my time and checked everything and had everything in and installed with no leaks in a little under 2 hours. Great product well put together and working great now with a great improvement in water flavor and ice clarity. FYI my numbers went for ~580 to ~50 with the provided meter.
customer_reviews.author: Edward C.

customer_reviews.title: Floods my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in May and now in July I'm having it removed because I'm tired of it flooding my kitchen. The fittings keep bursting so my water is turned off under the kitchen sink more than its on. My wood floor in the kitchen is warping now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good unit.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for several reasons, drinking water, aquarium use and gardening. It's simple to install but if you don't have 45 psi don't bother. Our coffee tastes great, the fish are loving it and I finally have proper ph for the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works.
customer_reviews.text: The change in our water is dramatic and wonderful. The directions could use a bit more clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hogan

customer_reviews.title: So far, good product. Happy with the end result.
customer_reviews.text: Installion was easy. Filters should actually be labeled 1,2,3. One can figure out which is which, however labeling would be fool proof. I gave up waiting for customer service when I phoned. I ended up installing in my basement just below my kitchen sink. I had to order extra tubing from another supply. It would have been nice to have this type of installion in the FAQ.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was fairly easy to install and the result is fantastic. The water tastes great and I feel comfortable drinking and serving his water to my family and guests. I would highly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: Apache Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love this system!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and produces great tasting water. This is a great value for money RO system and works much better than the system I used before (which was also more expensive).
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal , great product
customer_reviews.text: Filter system arrived quickly and was easy to install! No more bottled water !!
customer_reviews.author: William H. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Water !
customer_reviews.text: We have well water and could not take the taste or smell, no more going to the store and lugging home gallons of water. smell is gone and taste is great. glade we picked this one
customer_reviews.author: jacquelyn h.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to replace a GE Profile system I have had for 12 years. It has two more stages of filtration that the GE and makes water much faster. The installation was straight forward starting it up was simple.
customer_reviews.author: SGM

customer_reviews.title: great tasting
customer_reviews.text: I hired a handyman to install as it seemed too much for me to handle.. He installed it within 2 hours and it was worth it..
customer_reviews.author: Kim Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Worth it besides others items!
customer_reviews.text: No more buying water bottles!! My was missing the ph meter and didn't get one at all! I see alot of people's got the metal fitting for the water line connection. My was all plastic. The water tastes GREAT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, no leaks. Can't taste anything to really report of. Make sure you run the water for a while to empty the air gaps
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and saves me a lot of money too!
customer_reviews.text: I have canceled my monthly service with Culligan and am way ahead with saving money and can replace the filters as much as I want to 😊
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Carr

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Not so sure about the quality or the workmanship of this ro system.
customer_reviews.author: Dirty1er

customer_reviews.title: Clear ice cubes!! Highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend. Has saved me 100s dollars and benefits my health. Clean, empty water that I use to drink and cook with. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Taisner

customer_reviews.title: Wastes 10 gallons of water per 1 filtered. Good value and filters.
customer_reviews.text: Waste water is 10 gallons to 1 purified! Good value and filters. Reduced detectable solids from 440 to 14. Tastes great
customer_reviews.author: Andy L.

customer_reviews.title: Good filtration system
customer_reviews.text: The system is pretty solid and the taste is good. The contamination level was about 212 prior to filtering and after the filtering, it went down to below 20. The flow rate if way better than my previous system and this is the one without the pump! I would not imagine how fast the one with the pump. Overall satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: MAltindag

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic RO system!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and the water tastes great. We went from 125ppm to 9ppm. Water here in our area is very hard and not easy to drink from the faucet. I'm so glad that we purchased this! Directions were super easy and watching the online video made it a piece of cake. You won't be disappointed at all!
customer_reviews.author: Tinermom

customer_reviews.title: System works very well
customer_reviews.text: System works really well. A bit challenging to install, as the instructions could be better and more detailed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Berkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, one hour for me.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a difference in water quality! I add minerals and electrolytes back in! I keep two gallons ready to go at all times!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting water.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this system for our cottage. So far, we are very pleased with it, and the fact that we are drinking healthier water. We plan to purchase one for our home also. We have now purchased one for our home also. Very satisfied with this RO system.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this water filter
customer_reviews.text: I really love this water filter it works fantastic not hard to Install very easy step by steps video I recommend it the water taste is great no complains
customer_reviews.author: diego

customer_reviews.title: Hector M Cuevas
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, this water is better the bottle. I am sorprise whith the result. Big deal the price. In the home the water metter 122. But whith the filter NU AQUA the metter is only 0.14 that fabulus . I recomender this Sistem Osmosis 100 per cent. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto m

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. We had a professional install it just for our sound mind that it was done correctly. Our installer had it in in less than 45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: the results are good except there is no way it can produce 100 GPD!! my max is 15.5 gal in a 24hr period!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: water quality
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good system. the water quality is significantly improved. i just wish the tank would be a bit smaller because it's hard to squeeze it under my kitchen sink.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great system with a fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: I have been installing water treatment for over 30 years recently bought a new house and decided on this ro well built nice faucet and easy to install I would highly recommend this Ro.
customer_reviews.author: paul christensen

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I moved into a home with unfiltered water. The PPM was around 250. We ended up buying Great Value water bottles from walmart which were 15 PPM. After installing the NuAqua system our 250 PPM went down to 12 PPM!
customer_reviews.author: Robyne Mickelle

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to do it yourself installation my well water TDS is at 407 with filter 26 DP water is at 72 from the tester . Water n Ice n coffee taste better n my coffee maker doesn't have the residue as bad as it used to worth the bucks
customer_reviews.author: Nick Lane

customer_reviews.title: Love it, it's perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's not a rainsoft system, but pretty close. I would purchase it again and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Best quality filter you can get for the money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product after I had a similar filter system at my old home. This filter system was extremely simple to install and looks great. It works great for filling my coffee maker, drinking, and filling my saltwater aquarium that needs extremely clean water. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Royce Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great and tested under 15 ppm on the first run!!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Armey

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought and installed a few months ago, so have been using for awhile - installation was pretty straight-forward. This was the first one of these I've had - our water is quite hard and although the water didn't taste "bad," before, it is definitely "tasteless" now.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! Easy install and I’m so happy not to have to haul water bottles around!
customer_reviews.author: Mountain girl

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Back in May of 2019 I purchased one. We liked it so much, that I purchased a second one for my other home. Installation is easy. Very happy with the quality of the product. Filter replacements are reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: AU Platinum Series Osmonics 5 Filter System
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my NU Aqua Platinum Series Osmonics System. Easy to hook up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Schmit

customer_reviews.title: I've installed 4 or 5 of these, spoiled, will never drink tap water again.
customer_reviews.text: The TDS of my tap water is over 400. This filter is considered a necessary appliance to me. Great value, easy install, no leaks!
customer_reviews.author: Henry Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome RO system. I’m very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Stormie Winfield

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Took my tap water from 180ppm down to 3-5ppm. Waste water claim is accurate and it was easy to assemble. It has been in operation for over a year without issues. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mooj

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, heavy duty, high-quality RO system
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this unit on Saturday, it arrived the next day! I dove right in to installation, setting it up really was as easy as the video makes it look! After completing the flushing cycles as recommended, my Chicago tap water which was reading 160-175ppm and tasted like a swimming pool is now down to 12ppm and tastes as pure as any bottled water I've ever had. I bought this system for homebrewing and the ultra pure de-chlorinated water it provides is the perfect clean slate for building up custom water profiles to recreate beers from anywhere in the world. Super happy with my purchase, looking forward to upgrading with UV, permeate pump, etc. over the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good system, install very easy. The cost of filter replacements are way less than other system
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: the system works very well
customer_reviews.text: the price is very good,easy to install,the quality is so good,i like the system a lot.
customer_reviews.author: ledinhthai

customer_reviews.title: It will make a difference
customer_reviews.text: Great system, very easy to install. I love the water tester, you can clearly see how much your drinking water is improved with this system.
customer_reviews.author: Sergei Perkovskii

customer_reviews.title: Good first impression
customer_reviews.text: i had a GE system and nothing but problems. leaking, poor plastic quality. First impression is good. DVD is a bit weird, who looks at DVDs anymore?
customer_reviews.author: Imbga

customer_reviews.title: Greatly improved water quality.
customer_reviews.text: Before in istalling the RO filter our city tap water had 450 ppm. This filter reduced to 29 and the taste is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jake439

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: For $140 you can't go wrong with this unit. Fairly easy to install, comes with nice installation guide, tds meter, and instructional dvd (kinda useless). Took the tds of the water from ~160 to 12.
customer_reviews.author: Arabo

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works as intended. turned my rock solid water into nice tasting water! highly recommended, especially for people buying bottles of water.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, value for money
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and the water taste is also good.
customer_reviews.author: maheramsat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: System is working great. Old system was 20 years old and this system has increased our available RO water. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: We love it. No more buying water. We make our coffee, ice and cook with it in addition to drinking nothing no other water. You will not regret purchasing this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Judith A Wood

customer_reviews.title: GREAT UNIT
customer_reviews.text: This unit is such a wonderful addition to our home. We have found it very useful especially with our salt water fish tank! Highly recommend this product for anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: KIM KESLAR

customer_reviews.title: install was easy with one exception
customer_reviews.text: This unit, so far, has met my expectations. TDS is low, install was easy with one exception. After mounting the unit, and while testing, I found a large leak coming from between the second and third vertical cartridge holders. After disconnecting and removing the unit, I found that the connecting nipple there was cracked. I replaced the nipple and reinstalled the system. Operation has been without fault since. Overall, I like the unit and consider it to be a good value but I was frustrated with the additional install time. Perhaps higher schedule fittings should be considered in your assemblies and/or final assembly leak testing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Wilkinson

product_meta.title: NU Aqua Platinum Series Deluxe High Capacity 100GPD 5-Stage Under Sink Reverse Osmosis Ultimate Purifier Drinking Water Filter System - Bonus PPM Meter and Installation DVD
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY U.S. BRAND: The NU Aqua Platinum Series has gone through rigorous development and testing in our lab to provide consistent great tasting, clean and healthy water on demand. Featuring professional grade high quality quick connect fittings, an elegant NSF 100% lead-free designer faucet to keep your counter top looking great and double o-ring sealed filter housings to provide a guaranteed leak free experience

HIGH FLOW RATE: At 100GPD this system doubles the output of standard under sink drinking water filtration systems while increasing contaminant rejection rates and providing a taste superior to bottled water this systems 5 stages ensure the highest standard of drinking water quality unparalleled by pitcher filters or countertop purifiers

FREE BONUS INSTALLATION DVD AND PPM METER: Extremely easy do-it-yourself installation can take less than 1 hour with the provided step by step installation DVD or the easy to follow installation manual. Free Bonus PPM meters allows you test easily test your water quality. Color coded tubing, quick connect fittings and simple design allows the system to fit under standard kitchen sinks

CUTTING EDGE HYDRACOIL TECHNOLOGY: HydraCoil utilizes a specialty technology manufacturing process for up to 50% cleaner water than comparable systems. Our carbon filters provide a higher absorption rate due to the molecular structure of the pores becoming more permeable which allows even the smallest of particulates to be efficiently removed from your water. This allows the system to provide up to a 99% rejection rate of 1000+ contaminants such as arsenic, chlorine, fluoride, bacteria and lead

INDUSTRY LEADING 5 YEAR WARRANTY: Backed by an industry leading 5 year manufacture warranty and lifetime support the NU Aqua Platinum comes with the industries best support and a satisfaction guarantee
